subproject.corporate outcome: Development plans and programmes integrate environmentally sustainable solutions in a manner that promotes poverty reduction, MDG achievement and low-emission climate-resilient development
subproject.description: project is geared towards providing Technical Assistance for Awareness Raising in the Halon Sector and to reinforce and build on the gains made and maintain a zero level consumption of halons in the country.
